child-care-authorization-form.title: Child Care Authorization Form
child-care-authorization-form.description: Ensure your child receives proper care when you're unavailable. Give caregivers essential authority for emergencies.

child-care-contract.title: Child Care Contract
child-care-contract.description: Secure quality childcare with professional agreements that protect your family. Establish clear care expectations.

child-custody-agreement.title: Child Custody Agreement
child-custody-agreement.description: Protect your children's wellbeing during family transitions. Establish stable custody arrangements that prioritize their needs.

child-medical-consent.title: Child Medical Consent
child-medical-consent.description: Ensure your child receives prompt medical care in emergencies. Give trusted caregivers essential healthcare authority.

child-support-agreement.title: Child Support Agreement
child-support-agreement.description: Secure your children's financial future after family changes. Ensure adequate support for their needs and opportunities.

child-travel-consent.title: Child Travel Consent
child-travel-consent.description: Enable your child's travel opportunities while maintaining legal protection. Provide clear authorization for safe adventures.

cohabitation-agreement.title: Cohabitation Agreement
cohabitation-agreement.description: Enjoy committed relationships while protecting individual financial interests. Clarify expectations before complications arise.

divorce-settlement-agreement.title: Divorce Settlement Agreement
divorce-settlement-agreement.description: Secure your future and formalize divorce terms, including equitable property division, spousal support, and child custody arrangements.

dog-breeding-agreement.title: Dog Breeding Agreement
dog-breeding-agreement.description: Generate income from quality breeding while protecting your investment. Ensure healthy offspring with clear agreements.

elder-care-agreement.title: Elder Care Agreement
elder-care-agreement.description: Ensure quality care for aging loved ones while managing family responsibilities. Coordinate support and preserve dignity.

guardianship-agreement.title: Guardianship Agreement
guardianship-agreement.description: Protect your children's future by appointing trusted guardians. Ensure continuity of care if you become unavailable.

horse-boarding-agreement.title: Horse Boarding Agreement
horse-boarding-agreement.description: Ensure quality care for your horse while managing boarding costs. Access professional facilities and expert care.

marriage-separation-agreement.title: Marriage Separation Agreement
marriage-separation-agreement.description: Define clear terms for living apart, covering property, support, and custody, providing a roadmap for your separation.

parenting-plan.title: Parenting Plan
parenting-plan.description: Provide stability for your children during family transitions. Create comprehensive plans that prioritize their wellbeing.

personal-care-agreement.title: Personal Care Agreement
personal-care-agreement.description: Maintain independence and dignity with professional personal care services. Ensure quality assistance for daily needs.

pet-addendum.title: Pet Addendum
pet-addendum.description: Allow pets in rental properties while protecting your investment. Establish clear rules and damage protection.

pet-agreement.title: Pet Agreement
pet-agreement.description: Enjoy pet ownership while respecting property and roommate needs. Establish clear responsibilities and boundaries.

pet-custody-agreement.title: Pet Custody Agreement
pet-custody-agreement.description: Protect your beloved pets during relationship changes. Ensure continued care and visitation arrangements.

postnuptial-agreement.title: Postnuptial Agreement
postnuptial-agreement.description: Strengthen your marriage by clarifying financial responsibilities. Protect assets acquired during marriage.

power-of-attorney-for-child.title: Power Of Attorney For Child
power-of-attorney-for-child.description: Protect your child's interests when you're unavailable. Provide legal authority for trusted caregivers.

prenuptial-agreement.title: Prenuptial Agreement
prenuptial-agreement.description: Start marriage with financial clarity and protection. Preserve individual assets while building shared wealth.

separation-agreement.title: Separation Agreement
separation-agreement.description: Streamline your separation with a comprehensive agreement that clearly divides assets and responsibilities.
